definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
gradually/little by little/in the course of time

sentences.english: So there's real possibility of one of them existing without the other.
sentences.chinese: 這麼一來它們就真得有可能獨立存在了。

sentences.english: As a result, it is not necessary to maintain a positive ketosis test long term.
sentences.chinese: 這樣一來，就沒有必要堅持長期測試積極酮症了。

sentences.english: The manager's arrival galvanized the workers into activity.
sentences.chinese: 經理一來，工人聞風而動。

sentences.english: Perhaps it is because we would otherwise have to lament our limits.
sentences.chinese: 或許是因爲如此一來我們便會抱怨自己的限界。

sentences.english: As a result, significantly impact on the stability of the solder.
sentences.chinese: 這樣一來，就大大影響了焊錫的穩定性。

sentences.english: So apparently the passivity the inertia can be explained.
sentences.chinese: 這麼一來慣性的被動狀態就能說得通了。

sentences.english: He closed a head gate so that the moat dried up and she could walk through.
sentences.chinese: 這樣一來，壕中的水乾了，姑娘就可以走到果園去了。

sentences.english: An arrangement was therefore necessarily made.
sentences.chinese: 這一來就必須做出一種安排。

sentences.english: So what would you guess about these aberrant AOL users?
sentences.chinese: 這麼一來，你會怎麼猜想這些畸形的美國在線用戶？

sentences.english: We should thus subordinate the prevention of first offences to the prevention of recidivism .
sentences.chinese: 這樣一來，我們便會讓預防初犯屈從於預防累犯。

sentences.english: One to one, the junction is the leisurely Cher.
sentences.chinese: 一去一來，交接處，是雪兒的悠閒。

sentences.english: The years, the sky all underground.
sentences.chinese: 這一來，天上地下全部亂了套。

sentences.english: Since 1954, forty names have been retired.
sentences.chinese: 從1954年一來，光榮退役的名字有40個。

sentences.english: And so the herders moved ineluctably towards disaster.
sentences.chinese: 如此一來，牧民們不可避免地走向災難。

sentences.english: As a result, the stability of the county began to peace.
sentences.chinese: 這樣一來，安定郡開始太平起來。

definition: original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
